short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromium extension to provide a simple search form for querying Google when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromium extension to provide a simple search form for querying Google when you open a new tab. It's free, no Chromium permissions are needed, and source is available at: https://github.com/garysweaver/simple_search_tab_g
